value.name: Suspect in mobile home fire that killed 8-year-old Sunland Park girl acquitted
value.description: Police believe the crime was sparked by a love triangle between Ontiveros, her boyfriend, Jonathan Alvarado and a woman Alvarado had a child with. Ontiveros was scheduled to stand trial along with ...

value.name: 2nd man charged with murder in killing of model, 2 others | Charlotte Observer
value.description: Police have charged a second suspect with ... is charged with three counts of first-degree murder in the February deaths of Jonathan Alvarado, Jusmar Isiah Gonzaga-Garcia, and Mirjana Puhar.
